section.heading: Corrective Actions.
section.text: Subject to consultation with and the approval of the State Administrator, a local board shall take one of the following actions when a change is required in a ballot after the ballots have been printed:

para.text: If time does not permit reprinting, take all reasonable steps to notify voters of the change.

section.heading: Public Notice.
section.text: The notice to be provided under Regulation .01B of this chapter:

para.text: Shall include prominent notices posted at the affected polling places; and
Television, radio, and newspaper announcements and advertisements;
Information in the specimen ballot; and
